#summary Communicating with SAM via OSC

= Communicating with SAM via OSC ==
SAM uses the [http://opensoundcontrol.org/ Open Sound Control] (OSC) protocol for communicating with clients, renderers, and UIs.

== SAM/Client Messages ==

|| *OSC Address Pattern* || *OSC Type Tag String* || *OSC Arguments* || *Response* || *Comments* ||
|| `/sam/app/register` || `siiiiiiii` || `name`, `channels`, `x`, `y`, `width`, `height`, `depth`, `type`, `replyPort` || `/sam/app/regconfirm` or `/sam/app/regdeny` || ||
|| `/sam/app/regconfirm` || `iii` || `id`, `sampleRate`, `bufferSize`, `rtpBasePort` || none || ||
|| `/sam/app/regdeny` || `i`|| `errorCode` || none || error codes TBD ||
|| `/sam/app/unregister` || `i` || `id` || none || sending an `id` of `-1` tells SAM to unregister all clients ||


== SAM/Renderer Messages ==

|| *OSC Address Pattern* || *OSC Type Tag String* || *OSC Arguments* || *Response* || *Comments* ||
|| `/sam/stream/add` || `iii`(+) || `id`, `type`, `channels`, followed by a list of all channels (type `i`) || none || Sent by SAM to the renderer when a new stream is added (app registered).  Specifies the output channels that stream is using. ||
|| `/sam/stream/remove` || `i` || `id` || none || Sent by SAM when a stream is removed (app unregistered). ||
||`/sam/render/register` || `i` || `replyPort` || `/sam/render/regconfirm`, followed by `/sam/stream/add` for each app already registered with SAM or `/sam/render/regdeny`, `i`, `errorCode` (error codes TBD) || || 
||`/sam/render/unregister` || none  || none || none || ||
